thread.title: An Enormous Flock of Determined Indian Runner Ducks Eagerly Rush Off to Their Job at a Vineyard
thread.title_full: An Enormous Flock of Determined Indian Runner Ducks Eagerly Rush Off to Their Job at a Vineyard

author: Lori Dorn
title: An Enormous Flock of Determined Indian Runner Ducks Eagerly Rush Off to Their Job at a Vineyard
text:
An enormous flock Indian Runner ducks eagerly rushed off work at the South African winery that employed the determined birds to keep the vines snail-free. 

An explanation of how the ducks assist the winery .

via reddit
